tool_description:
A simple api that checks if an email address is valid and exists.
It checks the format of the address then tries to contact the server to make sure the address exists.
name: Verify Email
title: Verify Email

api_list.name: verify
api_list.description: Verify if an email address exists
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://verifyemail.p.rapidapi.com/verify/name@example.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "verifyemail.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://verifyemail.p.rapidapi.com/verify/{email}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "verifyemail.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
